ThingDef.label: troglodite egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized Troglodite egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: troglodite egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized troglodite egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a Troglodite. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
